ShinobuBot

Information Commands:
!about - get information about the bot
!help - Useless help page
!cmds - This page

Shitpost Commands:
!checkem - See if you're lucky enough to get doubles.
!currentyear <args> - I can't believe you're doing that in the current year

Fun Commands:
!flip - A basic coin flip. Heads or tails.
!palindrome  <arg> - checks if the word is a palindrome.
!ping - pong!

Owner Commands:
!kill - kills the bot
!mindtrick <channel ID> <args> - "This is not the command you are looking for."
!changegame <args> - Changes the bot's presence message
!acr <command name> / <response> - Add a custom command. For owners and admins only.
